description: APPLICATION FOR A LAWFUL DEVELOPMENT CERTIFICATE IN RESPECT OF THE PROPOSED ERECTION OF SINGLE STOREY REAR EXTENSION AND A REAR ROOF EXTENSION WITH 3 X ROOFLIGHT IN THE FRONT ROOF SLOPE.
decision_conditions: Condition : 1 - The operations comprising the erection of a single storey rear extension would consist of the enlargement of a dwelling house within the meaning of Class A of Part 1 of Schedule 2 to the Town & Country Planning (General Permitted Development)  (England) Order 2015 "the Order" and would comply with the development tolerances set out in said Class A. The operation would therefore have been granted planning permission by Article 3 of the Order.

Condition : 2 - The operations comprising the erection of a rear roof extension would consist of the enlargement of a dwelling house within the meaning of Class B of Part 1 of Schedule 2 to the Town & Country Planning (General Permitted Development)  (England) Order 2015 "the Order" and would comply with the development tolerances set out in said Class B. The operation would therefore have been granted planning permission by Article 3 of the Order.

Condition : 3 - The operations comprising the installation of rooflights to the front roof slope would consist of any other alteration to the roof of the dwelling house within the meaning of Class C of Part 1 of Schedule 2 to the Town & Country Planning (General Permitted Development)  (England) Order 2015 "the Order" and would comply with the development tolerances set out in said Class C. The operation would therefore have been granted planning permission by Article 3 of the Order.
